definition: actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to get carried away/to forget oneself
to not know the reason/to not know what to do
to know that it is so but not why it is so (idiom)
pinyin: zhi1 qi2 ran2 er2 bu4 zhi1 qi2 suo3 yi3 ran2
containing_words.word: 知其然而不知其所以然

definition: see 忘乎所以[wang4 hu1 suo3 yi3]

sentences.english: It was tight. so ti lasted a long time .
sentences.chinese: 两队不分胜负，所以持续了很长一段时间。

sentences.english: So is it correct English to split infinitives?
sentences.chinese: 所以我的答案是可以拆分不定式。

sentences.english: And so we can write this, ln minus nRT log V2 over V1.
In this way Pingya's room had been fumigated before he was moved in.
sentences.chinese: 所以平亚搬进他的新屋子之前，也得要用烟熏。

sentences.english: Mr. Black, I have just been married, therefore can I get a raise in my wages?
sentences.chinese: 布莱克先生，我刚刚结婚了，所以我能提薪吗？

sentences.english: So in the interest of helping out the next generation of thieves, I'm going to offer you a few pointers.
sentences.chinese: 所以，为了有助于下一代游荡者们，我准备教你几招。

sentences.english: So watch out for these tests because they happen all the time。
sentences.chinese: 所以，要当心这些测试，因为它们无时不在。

sentences.english: So don. t lose sight of your healthy diet pyramid when you do your shopping.
sentences.chinese: 所以你购物时要记起健康饮食金字塔。

sentences.english: So there is the first column, the first column, column 1.  It's the vector [2, -1].
sentences.chinese: 所以这是第一个列向量，向量1。

sentences.english: Cor. 2:8 Therefore I exhort you to confirm your love toward him.
sentences.chinese: 林后二8所以我劝你们，要向他证实你们的爱。

sentences.english: So saying sodium bicarbonate julep is in fact not true.
sentences.chinese: 所以说小苏打去黑头的说法其实不现实。

sentences.english: So Governor, thank you for your leadership on this bill.
sentences.chinese: 所以州长先生，感谢你在这项法案上起到的领导作用。

sentences.english: So the personality theory's got to go.
sentences.chinese: 所以不该采用人格理论了。

sentences.english: Don't be too happy to forget yourself.
I have no idea what they are going to say, so I'll have to play it by ear.
sentences.chinese: 我一点不知道他们将会说什么，所以我只好见机行事。

sentences.english: VOICE: So it sounds as if anabolic steroids can be very destructive.
sentences.chinese: 所以，听起来合成代谢类固醇的破坏性会很大。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
